title: {CRASH} FIREWALL ERROR
body: Please, someone, I am still having the firewall error come up after champion select. Nothing I have done is fixing the problem. Have had this issue now for two weeks since a patch came out. Any suggestions? And no, my firewall is not blocking anything, I have purged DNS and restarted it, all updates are up-to-date. Any help.

replies.body: same things happening to me.... I tried resolving the issue with the firewall and DNS but I'm still stuck in the reconnect menu... Help?
I've started talking to you about this on another discussion. Please continue talking to me there.
